long_description: If you're keeping your Burley D'Lite, Solo, Encore or Bee trailer outside for any length of time, the water-resistant Burley Trailer Storage cover will help protect it from sun and wet weather. Compatible with Burley D'Lite, Solo, Encore and Bee trailers (sold separately).
short_description: If you're keeping your Burley D'Lite, Solo, Encore or Bee trailer outside for any length of time, the water-resistant Burley Trailer Storage cover will help protect it from sun and wet weather.
